references.text: The mss. vary between Jovinus and Jobinus. cf. Theodoret, Ecc. Hist. iv. 13.

paragraphs.text: You owe me a good turn. For I lent you a kindness, which I ought to get back with interest;- a kind of interest, this, which our Lord does not refuse. Pay me, then, my friend, by paying me a visit. So much for the capital; what of the increment? It is the fact of the visit being paid by you, who are a man as much superior to me, as fathers are better than children.
